description: Styles for the Tic-Tac-Toe frontend application, including variables, layout, and component styling.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center alignment and background color.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Container for the game with responsive width.

classes.name: mode-button
classes.description: Button styles for mode selection with hover and selected states.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for the Tic-Tac-Toe board.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Styling for each cell in the Tic-Tac-Toe grid including hover effects.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for the game status display.

classes.name: restart-button
classes.description: Button styles for restarting the game.
